Translations.Text: Ur ten tenfaa ccafuaa imcafaen

i irewlen i izem
Zi$ yal yiwen degsen ib$a ad as d asen isebtar ifesren

Win ib$an, a t ismekti
Siwa ma Ib$a Oebbi ara d smektayen. D Neppa ay d Bab ueezzeb, d Bab n ssmae
Ggule$ s wass n tnekra

u i$ab waggur
u iiij akked waggur pwazdin
assen, amdan ad yini: "tarewla sani
